hero.heading: Crypto saving, made personal
hero.info: Thrift RealFi wallet lets you easily save, invest, pay and manage your funds without giving up your privacy, asset’s ownership, security or your data.
tags: Lend or save as a group

how.heading: How it works
how.info:
Track expenses, income, and create savings plan while growing your funds
conviniently. Do these things plus more in a non-custodial wallet. You’re in control.

list.heading: Powerful suite of tools
list.info: DeFi solutions are often complex, unintuitive, and hard to understand. Thrift makes it simple, providing real solutions to real life finance problems.

items.heading: Non-custodial Savings
items.info: Own your data, save your funds in the safest way, earn passively, get rewards, NFTs and much more.

items.heading: Crowd Lending
items.info: Join or create groups according to your saving goals, lend, and grow your wealth.

items.heading: Multiple Payments
items.info: For a single payment transaction fee, you can make multiple payments in one transaction.

features_block.heading: Build a Legacy of Financial Greatness
features_block.info: A Suite of RealFi products powered by Cardano to keep you in control of your finances. We leverage decentralization to help you overcome banking inefficiency.

items.title: SmartFi
items.info: Manage and analyze your personal finances better and easier

items.title: Governance
items.info: Through voting rights, the community governs, maintains, and upgrades Thrift.

items.title: Stable Currency
items.info: save in stable currency, stay ahead of the curve, and secure your future

items.title: Decentralized Digital Identity
items.info: Own your identity, no more unwanted prying eyes.

items.title: Digital Agregation
items.info: Trustless access to DeFi services and platforms.

items.title: Seamless UI/UX
items.info: No matter your background, you can use Thrift RealFi Wallet, it’s that simple.

thrift_peer.heading: Thrift P2P
thrift_peer.info: Securely exchange crypto for fiat with other users, communicate privately.

timeline.heading: Roadmap
timeline.info: First steps, our challenges, participation in incubation & acceleration programs.
